scripts.vue-personal-page: cd apps/vue-personal-page && npm run setup && cd ../..
scripts.webjack-api: cd apps/webjack-api && npm run setup && cd ../..
scripts.webjack: cd apps/webjack && npm run setup && cd ../..
scripts.setup: npm i && git submodule update -i && npm run vue-personal-page && npm run webjack && npm run webjack-api
scripts.d-start: docker run -d --name personal-server -p 80:80 -e DEFAULT_APP=vue-personal-page -e SESSION_SECRET=ssshhhhh -e LOG_FILENAME=development.log -e TRACER_LEVEL=log l3bowski/personal-server:latest
scripts.d-stop: docker stop personal-server && docker rm personal-server
